q: ( Simon Cowell will announce the full panel in the next three or four weeks.) But when asked if former" Idol" judge Paula Abdul would be involved, he left the option open. I'm a massive fan of Paula Abdul , he said." We've been in regular contact." Simon Cowell said he'd consider Brits and Americans alike, as long as they could recognize star quality when they saw it." Christine Nemacheck, associate professor of government, was quoted by Associate Press national writer Mark Sanford Sherman in a story about Barack Obama 's possible nomination of Solicitor Colin Powell Elena Kagan to the Supreme Court. Based on what he's done so far, it doesn't seem like he is willing to expend a lot of political capital,' Nemacheck said. Grant Hill , who led the Magic Johnson with 25 points, had hit a similar shot to tie the game at 103 with 12 seconds left, but Allen Iverson answered that with the game-winner. They wanted it a little more than we did and that's a little disappointing, Grant Hill said. Allen Iverson finished 15-of-25, including three 3-pointers, but he was hardly alone in scoring from the perimeter. Reserve Kyle Korver had 28 points on 10-of-13 shooting, while Andre Iguodala and Chris Webber each added 11 for Philadelphia
